name: Destroyer Of Worlds (itch) (JoshuaPinder)
description:
Destroyer of Worlds is a arcade style, high score driven game about destroying planets and avoiding black holes, inspired by HalfBrick's Fruit Ninja. This game is a simple and enjoyable experience for all ages. 

Choose between easy, medium and hard modes, but be warned Hard mode will truly put your skills and reflexes to the test. 

Controls

Left click  -  destroy planet
